welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Shively, the charming city known for its friendly community and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Louisville International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Louisville International Airport is primarily used for cargo and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bowman Field Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Bowman Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Godman AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Godman AAF Airport is exclusively for military use.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.
